name: travel_delays
rows: Incident on I-476 North. The right shoulder is blocked, expect delays.
Moving roadwork on I-76 eastbound at Exit: I-76 EAST - PHILADELPHIA. There is a lane restriction.
Disabled vehicle on BELMONT RD / QUEEN RD both directions between STRASBURG RD and LINCOLN HW. All lanes closed.
Road work on I-76 West. The right shoulder is closed.
